episode_event_newyear_2026/4001_1001_020:
At the beginning of the year, Hoopa let
a bunch of wild Pokémon loose on Pasio.
episode_event_newyear_2026/4001_1001_030:
Most have been caught, but we still haven’t
found all those that ran into the ocean.
episode_event_newyear_2026/4001_1001_040:
As you can see, the troublemaker feels bad
about what they did.
episode_event_newyear_2026/4001_1001_050:
And according to N, even Hoopa didn’t
expect this to happen. It was an accident.
episode_event_newyear_2026/4001_1001_060:
I hate to drag you all into this sad state of
affairs...
episode_event_newyear_2026/4001_1001_070:
but I’d like to ask your help cleaning up
this mess!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4001_1001_080:
We need to fish up all the Pokémon that
went underwater!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4001_1001_090:
Rest assured, you’ll be rewarded. I’ll spare
no expense!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4001_1001_110:
I’ve got an idea. Why don’t we hold a
fishing competition to gain more volunteers?
episode_event_newyear_2026/4001_1001_120: We could set aside a special prize...
episode_event_newyear_2026/4001_1001_130:
and give it to whoever reels in the biggest
Pokémon. It’d be exciting!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4001_1001_140:
Hmm... That IS a good idea. We need as
many participants as possible.
episode_event_newyear_2026/4001_1001_160: This is our chance to catch something big!
episode_event_newyear_2026/6801_1001_010:
Handcrafted items have a warmth that
makes them all the more lova-ball!
episode_event_newyear_2026/6801_1001_020: Oh yes, I understand all too well.
episode_event_newyear_2026/6801_1001_030:
My handmade fishing rods are more
comfortable to hold than others!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4002_1001_010:
You can use Apricorns and tumblestone as
crafting materials.
episode_event_newyear_2026/4002_1001_020:
And...ta-da! You’ve got yourself a
Poké Ball!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4002_1001_040:
Amazeballs! Handcrafted Poké Balls, huh?
What a fantastic idea!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4002_1001_050:
OK! Let’s get the ball rolling and craft
some more!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4002_1001_060: Thanks for the help, you two!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4003_1001_020:
But I’m glad I gave it a try! It was so
much fun!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4003_1001_040:
It really was worth holding a crafting
workshop!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4003_1001_070:
Ahahaha! You’re on the ball! This isn’t just
any Poké Ball!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4003_1001_080:
It’s part of a sygna suit for me and my
Electrode here!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4003_1001_090: Oh, sygna suits! I’ve heard about those!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4003_1001_100:
But that Electrode looks different from the
ones I’ve seen.
episode_event_newyear_2026/4003_1001_110:
Ah, that’s because this Electrode came from
the Hisui region.
episode_event_newyear_2026/4003_1001_120:
I usually wouldn’t have met a Pokémon
like this...
episode_event_newyear_2026/4003_1001_130:
But when I got caught in a space-time
distortion, these two helped me catch it!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4003_1001_140:
Then one day, once our friendship was
unmistaka-ball...
episode_event_newyear_2026/4003_1001_150: a sygna suit designer gave me this outfit!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4003_1001_170:
I’ve gotta give it to the pros—they’re on a
whole nother level!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4003_1001_180: Oh, do you know much about fashion?
episode_event_newyear_2026/4003_1001_200:
I’m an apprentice of the one and only
Valerie! She’s a fashion designer AND a
Kalos Gym Leader!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4003_1001_210:
I’m still in training, though, so I’ve a long
ways to go.
episode_event_newyear_2026/4003_1001_220:
Unlike everyone else, I kind of joined her
Gym on a whim.
episode_event_newyear_2026/4003_1001_240: Valerie has other apprentices, you see.
episode_event_newyear_2026/4003_1001_250:
A lot of the time, I feel like I don’t measure
up to them when it comes to designing and
Pokémon battling.
episode_event_newyear_2026/4003_1001_260:
I still have a lot to learn about both fashion
and Pokémon battles if I want to be amazing
like Lady Valerie.
episode_event_newyear_2026/4003_1001_270: Ah, to be young and have dreams...
episode_event_newyear_2026/4003_1001_280:
Then how about this? You could get yourself
a sygna suit like I did!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4003_1001_290:
It might give you some ideas for your
own designs!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4003_1001_300: I see! That might just do the trick!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4003_1001_310:
I’ve actually been thinking of making an
outfit like a sygna suit myself!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4003_1001_320:
Hmm... When a designer likes your
relationship with your partner Pokémon,
that’s when they’ll make you a sygna suit.
episode_event_newyear_2026/4003_1001_330:
Oh, I know! Why don’t you and your partner
Pokémon join the fishing competition?
episode_event_newyear_2026/4003_1001_340:
If you work together to catch some
Pokémon...
episode_event_newyear_2026/4003_1001_350:
it might prove your bond, especially if you
do well!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4003_1001_380: That’s the spirit! I’ll be cheering you on, too!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4003_1001_420:
But the best time to start is when you want
to give it a try!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4003_1001_430:
If you want, I—Lana—can teach you all
about fishing!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4004_1001_010:
Let’s start with some practice. I’ll walk you
through how to fish.
episode_event_newyear_2026/4004_1001_040:
First, you have to find somewhere water
Pokémon might be hiding.
episode_event_newyear_2026/4004_1001_050: Then, cast your line and wait.
episode_event_newyear_2026/4004_1001_080: When you get a bite, act quick and hook it!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4004_1001_090: Then, as long as you don’t let it get away...
episode_event_newyear_2026/4004_1001_100: There you have it! You fished up a Pokémon!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4004_1001_170:
That’s just how fishing is. You just have to
be patient.
episode_event_newyear_2026/4004_1001_190:
Linnea, you said earlier you want to make
an outfit like a sygna suit.
episode_event_newyear_2026/4004_1001_200:
Yes. I’d love to see someone wear
something I designed and made.
episode_event_newyear_2026/4004_1001_210:
Especially when they’re shining the brightest!
Wouldn’t that be nice?
episode_event_newyear_2026/4004_1001_230:
Actually, I have a dream, too. I’ve always
wanted to reel in a big catch here on Pasio.
episode_event_newyear_2026/4004_1001_240: This fishing competition might just be the key!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4004_1001_250:
Let’s both do our best to make our dreams
a reality.
episode_event_newyear_2026/4004_1001_270:
If both your dreams come true, I’ll help you
celebrate—with a fireworks show!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4004_1001_290: I’d love that! But why fireworks?
episode_event_newyear_2026/4004_1001_300:
Back in the days of Hisui, handcrafted balls
apparently shot out sparks on a successful
catch!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4004_1001_310:
So when someone I’m cheering for
succeeds...
episode_event_newyear_2026/4004_1001_320: I want to celebrate with some fireworks!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4004_1001_330: Then I suppose we’ll have to give it our all!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4004_1001_350:
Oh, the rod! I have to hook it quickly.
And then...
episode_event_newyear_2026/4004_1001_360: No need to rush! Let it swim a bit more.
episode_event_newyear_2026/4004_1001_400: Oh, I know! Aromatisse! Can you help me?
episode_event_newyear_2026/4004_1101_410:
The wild Pokémon calmed down thanks to
Aromatisse’s scent!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4004_1001_430: You’ve reeled in quite a catch!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4004_1001_440:
Your teamwork with your partner Pokémon
was great, too!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4004_1001_480: but we just caught something HUGE!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4005_1001_010: Check out what I reeled in!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4005_1001_040: I haven’t seen that Pokémon in Alola.
episode_event_newyear_2026/4005_1001_060:
Apparently it’s Dondozo—a Pokémon that
lives in lakes in Paldea!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4005_1001_070: Looks like Nessa might take first place, then.
episode_event_newyear_2026/4005_1001_100: You think something bigger’s out there?
episode_event_newyear_2026/4005_1001_120:
This must be...a scale. And it’s the same as
this Pokémon’s.
episode_event_newyear_2026/4005_1001_140: It was stuck to my catch when I reeled it in.
episode_event_newyear_2026/4005_1001_150:
Maybe this Dondozo fought another one just
as big!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4005_1001_170:
A Dondozo of a different color is still lurking
somewhere?
episode_event_newyear_2026/4005_1001_200:
We’re rivals. I want the competition between
us to be fair and square!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4005_1001_210:
Let’s see who reels in that big, golden
catch first!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4005_1001_240: You can do it! You’re the greatest!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4005_1001_260:
But...I still have more about fishing to teach
you, Linnea.
episode_event_newyear_2026/4005_1001_270:
Don’t worry about me! Let’s make YOUR
dream come true!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4005_1001_280: Thanks! I won’t let you down!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4005_1001_290:
First, let’s find where underwater a huge
Pokémon might be hiding.
episode_event_newyear_2026/4006_1101_010: Time passed in the blink of an eye...
episode_event_newyear_2026/4006_1001_040: Do you think someone else already caught it?
episode_event_newyear_2026/4006_1001_050: Or maybe it retreated further out to sea.
episode_event_newyear_2026/4006_1001_060: I was so hyped at first, but...
episode_event_newyear_2026/4006_1001_070:
I guess you can’t always trust your
feelings, huh?
episode_event_newyear_2026/4006_1001_080: Actually, I think it’s important to be excited.
episode_event_newyear_2026/4006_1001_090:
If you aren’t passionate about something,
sometimes you’ll never start in the
first place.
episode_event_newyear_2026/4006_1001_100:
But then you have to hang tight and be
patient—just like with fishing.
episode_event_newyear_2026/4006_1001_120: It can be. But the key is to never rush.
episode_event_newyear_2026/4006_1001_130:
Even if you get zero bites for days on end,
you just have to keep waiting.
episode_event_newyear_2026/4006_1001_150:
And when you’re looking for a new
fishing spot...
episode_event_newyear_2026/4006_1001_160:
it can be fun to chat with your fishing
buddies about how nothing’s biting.
episode_event_newyear_2026/4006_1001_170:
All the trial and error may feel like a waste
of time...
episode_event_newyear_2026/4006_1001_180:
but it all leads to that moment you’ve been
waiting for.
episode_event_newyear_2026/4006_1001_220: Lana! Don’t let it get away!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4006_1001_230: Whoa! Hang in there, Ms. Lana!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4006_1001_240: Of course! I won’t miss this opportunity!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4007_1001_010:
This is our only chance! We can’t let this
huge catch get away!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4007_1001_030: Oh, that must be the Terastal phenomenon!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4007_1001_040:
I know! I can use Aromatisse’s scent to make
it lose its will to fight, just like I did with my
catch earlier!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4007_1001_050: Electrode and I can help, too!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4007_1001_070:
Fishing should be a head-on battle between
the fisher and the Pokémon!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4007_1001_080: Let me try reeling this in myself!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4008_1001_040:
That fight to reel you in is one I’ll remember
forever.
episode_event_newyear_2026/4009_1001_010: Well done, everyone! You have my thanks!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4009_1001_020:
Thanks to the fishing competition, we were
able to catch all the water Pokémon that
were set loose on Pasio!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4009_1001_030:
And now, allow me to announce who caught
the biggest.
episode_event_newyear_2026/4009_1001_040:
Lana! Your efforts are hereby celebrated and
rewarded!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4009_1001_080: There’s so much more I’d like to say...
episode_event_newyear_2026/4009_1001_090:
But first, I made this for you—to celebrate!
Will you wear it for me?
episode_event_newyear_2026/4010_1001_020:
I made this outfit hoping you’ll always
remember the fishing competition and the
fight to reel in that big catch!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4010_1001_030: So many feelings went into it!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4010_1001_040: There are limits to what I can do now...
episode_event_newyear_2026/4010_1001_050:
but in order to design better outfits and
catch up to everyone else...
episode_event_newyear_2026/4010_1001_060: I’ll do my best—and keep at it!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4010_1001_080:
Outfits made with someone in mind always
shine the brightest.
episode_event_newyear_2026/4010_1001_100:
Those pure and honest feelings...
I hope you continue to treasure them.
episode_event_newyear_2026/4010_1001_110:
I look forward to seeing you blossom as a
designer.
episode_event_newyear_2026/4010_1001_130: Wow! Do you know what this means?
episode_event_newyear_2026/4010_1001_140:
Linnea’s dream to design an outfit like a
sygna suit came true!
episode_event_newyear_2026/4010_1001_170: Oh. I think I know what they’re up to.
